title: Opening Week Thoughts with Chiney Ogwumike
description:
Zach and ESPN's Chiney Ogwumike go rapid-fire around the first week of NBA action: Lakers struggles, Kawhi and Wall are back, 0-2 Sixers, Pelicans roaring out of the gate, Nets expectations, Banchero, Ivey, Cavs, Warriors repeat chances, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Zach Lowe
